name: Pyramid Solitaire - iPyramid
description:
A great game to relax, improve your concentration and practice your logical reasoning.

iPyramid has a simple and intuitive interface with a smart gameplay that provides a dynamic game experience even in portable devices

Main features:

- The interface adjusts for righties or lefties
- Big cards
- Cards animations
- Universal app (iPhone and iPad)
- Unlimited undo steps
- Game Center (leaderboards and achievements)
- Game sounds
- It’s possible to restart the game
- Game automatically saved when the app is closed
- 3 difficulty levels
- Drag and drop
- Different cards backs
